name: The Red Fury
description:
He sits on the flaming throne. keeping his servants alive and well. e plots wars and bloodshed. he clears upfield with his majestic swords. he grows trees and a wide lake. he never talks. he suffers over mountains and oceans, yet he keeps them standing.

the red fury has 666 servants. their wings spread as wide as the morning sky. these servants are covered in human blood, through the fire they live, through wars they breathe, and through suffering, they survive. all servants offer their lives to their king the red fury, the red fury is the only one who knows their never-ending pain. 

for them, the red fury was the one who redeems their lives.
